Posts.EditableText:
I'm not aware of any problems at present, although the google integration occasionally has odd stability issues.

Are you sure you're using the right URL? The page address needs to start with `https://` rather than `http://` - that's the most common reason for people being unable to create new Quest games; and I know that most OAuth2 services now require https as well.
